thread.title: Long Island bartender accused of stealing $15,000
thread.title_full: Long Island bartender accused of stealing $15,000 - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Long Island bartender accused of stealing $15,000
text:
MASSAPEQUA, N.Y. (AP) - A Long Island bartender is accused of stealing $15,000 from his employer.
Nassau County police say the theft occurred at Smuggler Jack's Restaurant and Bar in Massapequa between June and October.
They say 33-year-old George Katsihtis admitted to taking the money. Police say other evidence included video and business receipts.
He was arraigned Tuesday on a third-degree larceny charge.
Newsday ( http://nwsdy.li/1VS9W8U ) says he was represented by Legal Aid, which does not comment on cases.
Information from: Newsday, http://www.newsday.com
